Slugde/Artemis::

"When will Pacifix come?" asked Artemis

"Sludge wants smash Predacon, Sludge wants smash Predacons" said the 
dinobot while he walked towards the ship


--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> ::Slag/JetV::
> Slag walks into the secret chamber.  "Yes smash" he announces aloud.
> "But it may not be Predacons" he says even louder looking straight 
at
> Crossroads and the other so called Autobots of the future.
> 
> JetV walks out.
> "Hey, the ship is ready for boarding but you may want to stay out 
till
> Pacifix gets here."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > Sludge::
> >
> > "Smash predacons, smash predacons" said slugde
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> > > Grimlock stops his fiery stare on Crossroads, and turns his
> > attention to
> > > Sludge. "We go to Earth to make sure the Predacons isnt mucking
> > around."
